original_title: Dredg: Live Performance at the Henry Fonda Theater
overview: Live from the Henry Fonda Theater was a live concert of the band Dredg, released on DVD as a promotional tool for their third album, Catch Without Arms. The DVD was recorded live on June 24, 2005 at the Henry Fonda Theater in Los Angeles, California. It consists of the band playing several songs from the album, mixed with parts of an interview with the band and promos for the album.
title: Dredg: Live Performance at the Henry Fonda Theater
